game.name: Sniper 3D City Apocalypse
game.description:
The entire world has suddenly started suffering from the negative impacts of a deadly virus. The primary objective of this virus is to transform the human beings into the blood-thirsty zombies. Your bad luck is that your city is also under the attack. And, suddenly you find every undead instead of the human beings. Luckily, you are one of a few survivors. But, remember you would soon join their community if you cannot forward and fight like a true fighter. Grab your sniper rifle and finish all of them to survive long in Sniper 3D: City Apocalypse!

Your city is full of dangerous zombies which would not show pity on you for a single second. Enter the battlefield and fight like no tomorrow in this 3D action shooter! Prove the world that you also know how to fight for your goal. These evil creatures are good in number, but your excellent command over the gun and aiming target will help you get through all the obstacles. Try to be alert all the time as your enemies come from different directions! Your accuracy will bring some extra points and bonuses that will help improve your weapon. 

Apart from the zombies, these living deads can be harmless animals, friendly dog and heartless people. They only want your brains. Come in the position fast to aim and shoot them accurately! Try to get a headshot as this will send them to the hell immediately! There are possibilities of coming back if you shoot at their arm or chest. Be prepared to test your shooting and survival abilities to enjoy the thrill and entertainment of the apocalypse world!!
